name: Hair & Kebab
description:
Welcome to "Hair & Kebab", the newest and most exciting hair implant simulation game! In this game, you play as the owner of a clinic specializing in hair implants. Your goal is to manage your clinic by performing top-notch hair implants. The game is filled with exciting challenges and unexpected situations that require you to be quick and clever to succeed. The vibrant graphics and detailed animations make the gaming experience highly immersive. So, are you ready to take on the challenge of becoming the best hair implant clinician ? Download "Hair & Kebab" now and embark on the adventure!

This is the game for the Global Game Jam 2023 with : 

FROMENT Eliot : Dev

GODART Anthony : 3D

STANCZYK Alex : 2D

GAUTHIER Marie : 2D and bald people
